DOC.brief_summary: Currently , office visit general practitioner free charge patient . However , public commission Danish Economic Council suggest implement user charge service currently free charge . The aim study examine consequence introduce user charge general practitioner service . Data project collect patient appointment general practitioner . Patients ask whether willing pay specify amount consultation schedule . After consultation , GP register diagnosis .
DOC.brief_title: User Charges General Practitioner Services Denmark
DOC.criteria: Patients appointment visit general practitioner clinic Reads understand Danish
